text:
the Delete coretask does not support the attribute failonerror under Sun OS 
when running under Sun 2.7
creator: dahlquist@teraburst.com
steve_l@iseran.com
text:
There is a failonerror attribute of the delete task of ant 1.4, though not 
before, and it shouldnt be an OS dependent issue. Therefore this report is 
intrigues me.

1. what is the output of ant -version ?
2. what is the error you are seeing ?
3. can you post the build file, or a snippet thereof.
